name: Tuppi
description:
The game is a traditional Finnish card game for four players, where players seating opposite of each other form a pair and play against the other pair. It contains two different game modes; Rami and Nolo. In Rami, you try to collect as much tricks as you can with your pair. In Nolo, you try to avoid the tricks.

Traditionally people have posted the results of a Tuppi game in a local newspaper.

This was a first game I have created and published with cocos2d-x v4.0.

Things learned about the engine and usage during development:

  • Ref -system
  • Sprites
  • Nodes
  • Layers
  • Scenes
  • Actions
  • Shaders
  • Scene graph
  • UI nodes
  • Event system (custom and touch events)
  • Android build
  • Google play release cycle
